name: Snek's Quest
description:
Oh boy, I'll grab my stuff!

Join the purple cobra, Snek, as he journeys through an ancient temple on a quest to collect treasure in a fever dream of early YouTube videos.

Note from the developer:

Snek's Quest V 1.4 - OFFICIAL RELEASE 9/18/2019 8:33pm EST

Hello :)

This is my first shipped game. I had one week to create a game in Unity 2D for a final project in my college and decided to make a game in homage to the early internet era where YouTube Poop memes ran wild.

I hope the game is of some form of hilarity to those of you who play it.

Any feedback would be much welcomed!
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Some notes/bugs;

NEW:
V1.4:
* Pause button and attack buttons were conflicting. Corrected this issue in this release.

Previous Version(s):
V1.3:
* Changed the pause button from a GUI button to a canvas button. Much more efficient.
V1.2:
* Added a pause button while in-game!
*Fixed some bugs due to player feedback.
*Optimized some code behind the scenes to make the game run more efficiently!
V1.1:
*Fixed some visual issues with the credits screen not display all characters.
* When you collect all the treasure, the sound effect from Zelda, the 'Secret' jingle is supposed to play. Sometimes it doesn't, but the door does still open every time after a few seconds.
* Each time you pick up a treasure chest, a random YouTube Poop sound effect is played. Different sounds each time you play!
P.S. The easter egg was all hand-made, coded and created from scratch using just sprite assets. Had to make it as accurate as possible.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
